@pixi-pbr/diffy > BufferInvalidationQueue

BufferInvalidationQueue 

class BufferInvalidationQueue

The buffer invalidation queue manages a singly-linked list of buffer invalidations.

Constructor

new BufferInvalidationQueue() → {}

partition BufferInvalidationQueue.ts:112 
partition(threshold) → {void}

This will repartition the invalidated buffer indices into fewer, larger segments. This is mainly used to avoid issuing too many bufferSubData when sparse, small changes occur in the geometry.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
threshold
Returns:
Type Description
void

Protected Methods

coalesce BufferInvalidationQueue.ts:219 
protected coalesce(node: BufferInvalidation) → {BufferInvalidation}

Coalesces node and its successor node.next into one. The successor is released from the queue.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
node BufferInvalidation

the node with coalesce
Returns:
